Bosses.Name: Zodiark (Phase 1)
Bosses.Strategy: Phase 1 introduces the base mechanics of the fight.

KeyMechanics.Name: Exoterikos
KeyMechanics.Description:
Boss fires a beam to one of the sides of the arena that turns into a rune.

Trinagle shaped rune:
Cone AoE across the room from the rune.
Square shaped rune:
Half room AoE on the side of the rune.

     Δ rune               □ rune
                X   |        XX
          XXX   |        XX
Δ XXXXX   |   □ XX
          XXX   |        XX
                X   |        XX

KeyMechanics.Name: Paradeigma
KeyMechanics.Description:
Summons one of two possible mechanics:

Behemoths: 
Large circle AoEs around the Behemoths that each take up one quadrant of the arena
Snakes: 
Line AoEs across the platform that take up two quarters of the arena.

KeyMechanics.Name: Adikia
KeyMechanics.Description: Boss punches the platform twice, resulting in two massive circle AoEs.

KeyMechanics.Name: Phlegeton
KeyMechanics.Description: Three sets of circle AoEs spawn under players.

KeyMechanics.Name: Astral Flow
KeyMechanics.Description:
Used immediately after Paradeigma. 
Boss rotates the arena with the spawned adds, while players are held in place.

KeyMechanics.Name: Triple Esoteric Ray
KeyMechanics.Description:
Casts 3 beams that cover the entire arena. 
The order in which magic circles appear indicates the order of the beams being fired.

KeyMechanics.Name: Algedon
KeyMechanics.Description: Diagonal dive attack that knocks anyone hit off the platform.

KeyMechanics.Name: Astral Eclipse
KeyMechanics.Description:
Boss flies around the arena spawning patterns of stars in specific alignments. These alignments show which areas of the arena are hit by AoEs.
The stars are aligned on a 3x3 grid that is then projected onto the arena from the side where the stars are coming from.

Patterns:
      X   |   X   X   |      X
XXX   |               |   XXX
X         |   X   X   |      X

KeyMechanics.Name: Trimorphos Exoterikos
KeyMechanics.Description: Boss casts 3 Exoterikos runes at every other edge of the arena that go off one by one.
